channel.title: [PI] Changing the logout interface
channel.description:
Hey guys, I've made a custom interface for logging out, but I've ran into a problem of getting it to actually work
Basically what i need it to do is when you click the "X" In the top right hand corner, I need it to open up that interface, I change the client side, sidebutton but that just made it load into the side gameframe thing, when i need it to load in the gameplay screen, If anyone knows how to do this, please let me know, thanks :)

item.title: [PI] Changing the logout interface
item.dc:creator: @Dragonxile Dragonxile
item.description:
@Dragonxile wrote:

Hey guys, I’ve made a custom interface for logging out, but I’ve ran into a problem of getting it to actually work

Basically what i need it to do is when you click the “X” In the top right hand corner, I need it to open up that interface, I change the client side, sidebutton but that just made it load into the side gameframe thing, when i need it to load in the gameplay screen, If anyone knows how to do this, please let me know, thanks
